reviews.review_msg: Joan is a very knowledgeable professor and has a lot of research experience. Her class was informative, but the slideshows she uses are repetitive and shows too many pointless videos. There is a 5000-5500 word paper that is killer to write. This professor did not feel apparoachable, and she always rushed out of class as soon as it was over.

I never comment on this site, but I have to do Joan some justice. She's very knowledgeable in her area of expertise. She provides a huge degree of freedom for your term paper and marks fair. For those of you that think she's too hard, read your comments again. Maybe fixing your grammar will get you a better grade so you don't have to complain...

Hard class! 20 Page term paper! U best stay away!! She marks fine, but is un-forgiving on the term paper! Expects alot!! Definitely has favorites in the class!! Stay away from this prof! And stay away from Crim 436 (Corporate crime) she teaches that as well. Would not take another class with her, hate her teacher style!! Lectures boring and dry!!!
Joan is hard, but fair. Class was really interesting. Big participation component.
